extensionDescription.message: HTTP Header Spy toont de request-, response headers en cookies direct nadat een pagina geladen is, zonder extra klikken.

extensionNameShort.description: The short name of the extension

plansDisplayName.description: Menu title for 'Enable extra options' page

optionsPageDisplayOptionsPressEscapeToHi.description: Press the ESC key to hide panels.
optionsPageDisplayOptionsPressEscapeToHi.message: Gebruik de ESC toets om panelen te verbergen.

optionsPageDisplayOptionsAutoHide.description: Press the ESC key to hide panels.
optionsPageDisplayOptionsAutoHide.message: Als automatisch verbergen is ingeschakeld, wordt de filter balk niet getoond.

optionsPageDisplayOptionsModeUsingA.description: mode, in the [bottom right corner] ___using a___

optionsPageDisplayOptionsAndShowThe.description: using a [light theme] ___and show the___ [x] most recent requests

optionsPageDisplayOptionsMostRecentReque.description: using a [light theme] and show the [x] ___most recent requests___

optionsPageHideRequestHeadersDescription.description: Request headers (or patterns thereof) that will not be displayed.
optionsPageHideRequestHeadersDescription.message: Request headers (of delen daarvan) die niet zullen worden getoond.

optionsPageHideResponseHeadersDescriptio.description: Response headers (or patterns thereof) that will not be displayed.
optionsPageHideResponseHeadersDescriptio.message: Response headers (of delen daarvan) die niet zullen worden getoond.

optionsPageMicroModeHeaders.description: Headers to show in Micro mode
optionsPageMicroModeHeaders.message: Headers die in Micro modus getoond worden

optionsPageMicroModeHeadersDescription.description: Response headers (or patterns thereof) that will be shown in micro mode.
optionsPageMicroModeHeadersDescription.message: Response headers (of delen daarvan) die zullen worden getoond in micro modus.

optionsPageStringsToHightlightDescriptio.description: Headers (or patterns thereof) that will be
optionsPageStringsToHightlightDescriptio.message: Headers (of delen daarvan) die zullen worden

optionsPageStringsToHightlightDescriptio.description: Headers (or patterns thereof) that will be ___highlighted___

plansPageYouCan.description: ___You can___ test all these great features every first 15 minutes of every hour:

plansPageTest.description: You can ___test___ all these great features every first 15 minutes of every hour:

plansPageTheseFeatures.description: You can test ___all these great features___ every first 15 minutes of every hour:

plansPageEveryFirst.description: You can test all these great features ___every first 15 minutes___ of every hour:

plansPageOfEveryHour.description: You can test all these great features every first 15 minutes ___of every hour___:

plansPageOptionRequestTimes.description: Request times: time to headers received, time to first byte and time to complete
plansPageOptionRequestTimes.message: Request tijden: tijd tot ontvangen response headers, tijd tot eerste byte en tijd tot voltooiing

plansPageOptionFilterBar.description: Use the filter bar to filter the headers
plansPageOptionFilterBar.message: Gebruik de filter-balk om headers te filteren

plansPageEnableFeatures.description: ___If you want to enable these features___ permanently, please support further development by donating me some beer/pizza:

plansPageEnableFeaturesPermanently.description: If you want to enable these features ___permanently___, please support further development by donating me some beer/pizza:

plansPageEnableFeaturesPleaseSupport.description: If you want to enable these features permanently___, please support further development by donating me some beer/pizza___:
plansPageEnableFeaturesPleaseSupport.message: wilt inschakelen, kun je verdere ontwikkeling ondersteunen door wat bier/pizza te doneren

buyErrorRetrievingProducts.message: Er is een fout opgetreden bij het ophalen van de produkten

buyErrorRetrievingPurchasedProducts.description: Error retreiving list of purchased products
buyErrorRetrievingPurchasedProducts.message: Er is een fout opgetreden bij het ophalen van de produkten

aboutPageContent.message: Mijn naam is Michiel Roos. Ik vond het leuk om deze add-on te ontwikkelen. Ik heb er veel van geleerd. Ik hoop dat je hem nuttig vindt en hem gebruikt met plezier. Als je suggesties of opbouwende kritiek hebt, neem dan contact met me op.

aboutPageContentConsiderDonation.description: Do you enjoy this extension? Please consider a donation:
aboutPageContentConsiderDonation.message: Heb je plezier van deze extensie, overweeg een donatie.

popupDefaultMessage.description: The default message shown in the browserAction popup
popupDefaultMessage.message: Er zijn nog geen headers ontvangen. Ververs deze tab om de headers te zien.

contentMessagesPressEscToClosePanels.description: [esc] closes these panels. Click to toggle panels.
contentMessagesPressEscToClosePanels.message: [esc] sluit deze panelen. Klik om panelen te tonen / verbergen.

contentMessagesTimeToFirstByte.description: shorthand for time to first byte: ___first byte___
